$!Make a claim for Child Tax Credit or Working Tax Credit or report a change.$!

$C
**Tax Credit Helpline**

**Telephone:** 0345 300 3900  
**Textphone:** 0345 300 3909  
**Calling from outside the UK:** +44 2890 538 192  
Monday to Friday 8am to 8pm  
Saturday 8am to 4pm  
$C

$A
Tax Credit Office
Preston
PR1 4AT
$A
 
Get help with your enquiries about:

* [Working Tax Credit](/working-tax-credit "Find out more about Working Tax Credit")
* [Child Tax Credit](/child-tax-credit "Find out more about Child Tax Credit")
overview: Contact the Tax Credit Office if you have a query about Child Tax Credit or Working Tax Credit
title: Contact the Tax Credit Office
